sentences.en: Be thrifty and hardworking in whatever undertaking you are to start on.
Both organizations gave an undertaking to curb violence among their members.
sentences.cn: 两个组织都作出承诺要约束其成员的暴力行为。

sentences.en: He associated himself with his friend in a business undertaking.
He has sunk half his fortune in a new business undertaking.
sentences.cn: 他已把一半财产投资与一家新的企业中.

sentences.en: He is interested in buying the club as a commercial undertaking.
sentences.cn: 他有意购买那个俱乐部作为投资。

sentences.en: He was entrapped into undertaking the work.

sentences.cn: 那件事办起来像没个完似的.

sentences.en: Making the house habitable was a major undertaking.
sentences.cn: 把这所房子收拾得可以住人，那可是项大工程。

sentences.en: Organizing the show has been a massive undertaking.
sentences.cn: 组织那场演出是一项浩大的工程。

sentences.en: Rejecting Vice Admiral Halsey to his face was an unhealthy undertaking.
sentences.cn: 当面回绝海尔赛海军中将的做法不太好.

sentences.en: Starting a new business can be a risky undertaking.
sentences.cn: 创办新企业有时是一件有风险的事情。

sentences.en: The MOD gave an undertaking to Saville that it had provided him with all relevant material.
sentences.cn: 国防部向萨维尔保证已向他提供了所有相关的资料。

sentences.en: Their installation proved a laborious undertaking.
sentences.cn: 要来安顿这些人,确实是一件麻烦的事情.

sentences.en: Their motives for undertaking this study are highly questionable.
sentences.cn: 他们承担这项研究的动机大有问题.

sentences.en: This is not a suitable time for launching forth on a new business undertaking.
sentences.cn: 现在,不宜着手搞新的经营项目.

words.tran_cn: 承担者；承办人；殡仪业者
承担，保证；从事；同意；试图

trans.tran_cn: 企业，事业，殡仪事业，保证
trans.tran_en: an important job, piece of work, or activity that you are responsible for

trans.tran_cn: 担任( undertake的现在分词)，着手作
